backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles, tests, courses, sessions, OTP flow, Stripe checkout data, and authorization checks with various in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for build restoration and deployment validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing component behavior, styling systems, routing, and build-related fixes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon paths, sitemap reference, Google verification, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing key site URLs with last-modified dates, change frequency, and priority metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app establishing routing, session-based authentication, lazy‑loaded pages, error boundaries, and profile‑setup modal logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, social links, navigation shortcuts, and build version display using red/blue theme classes.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with navigation, branding, and user menu integrating Internet Identity and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Mobile OTP login modal handling OTP send, verification, connection states, and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/MobileLoginModal: Alternative mobile login modal managing OTP generation, verification, countdown, and copy-to-clipboard behavior.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Profile setup modal allowing users to submit name, mobile, email, and avatar upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/SignupModal.tsx: Deprecated signup modal showing a notice directing users to mobile OTP authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileAuth.ts: Implements mobile OTP authentication flow with retries, actor readiness checks, and Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, tests, courses, syllabi, and Stripe settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, utility classes, animations, and styling enhancements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering React root with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing users, mock tests, courses, syllabi, and Stripe settings with role-based access.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays all video courses grouped by subject with detailed course cards and video accordions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, key features, and navigation options with auth‑based actions.
frontend/src/pages/MockTestsPage.tsx: Displays mock tests grouped by subject with purchase handling via checkout sessions.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Shows a payment failure message with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a payment success message and links to access purchased content.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile editor supporting name, mobile, and photo upload with validation and save logic.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user progress metrics and charts based on test results and activity data.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusPage.tsx: React page that fetches and displays syllabi using cards and accordions with dynamic accent styles.
frontend/src/utils/accents.ts: Provides brand accent utilities for generating Tailwind class strings for red/blue themes and alternating UI styles.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Defines build metadata and a helper to return the current draft version string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with brand color safelists, plugins, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking schema version, issues, and feature requests for the Exam Xpresss project.
